channel.title: cheatsheet on Malware Hell
channel.description: Recent content in cheatsheet on Malware Hell

item.title: CheatSheet
item.description: Description Command sha256 folder find . -maxdepth 1 -type f | while read i; mv $i (sha256sum $i | grep -Po ‘^[a-f0-9]+’); end download hashes from clipboard xclip -o -s -c | xargs -I {} echo “vt download {}” | parallel -j 8 {} binlex top 10 traits find samples/ -type f | while read i; binlex -i $i | jq -r ’trait’ | sort | uniq; end | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | head -10
